org.ow2.bonita.facade.privilege.Rule

Packages that use Rule
org.ow2.bonita.facade Contains interfaces for accessing Bonita APIs. 
org.ow2.bonita.facade.internal All interfaces in this package are for internal use only. 
org.ow2.bonita.facade.privilege.impl Contains classes for using privileges/access permissions to processes (internal use only). 
org.ow2.bonita.facade.rest.stringconverter   
 

Uses of Rule in org.ow2.bonita.facade
 

Methods in org.ow2.bonita.facade that return Rule
 Rule ManagementAPI.createRule(String name, String label, String description, Rule.RuleType type)
          The global policy is applied to all entities.
Rules apply conditions to the policy as they are applied to specific entities.
This method creates a rule identified by its name.
It means that the entities bound to this rule will NOT follow the global policy anymore.
 Rule ManagementAPI.getRuleByUUID(String ruleUUID)
          The global policy is applied to all entities.
Rules apply conditions to the policy as they are applied to specific entities.
Get a rule identified by its name.
 Rule ManagementAPI.updateRuleByUUID(String ruleUUID, String name, String label, String description)
          The global policy is applied to all entities.
Rules apply conditions to the policy as they are applied to specific entities.
Update a rule identified by its name with the values stored in the rule object.
